column4: Hey all... I'm new to Linux and jacked up my primary user account. I created a secondary user and want to get rid of my primary user & home. I deleted the user under "user settings", but how do I get rid of the home directory?
your new user needs to have admin priviledges,   or try doing it by booting hte live cd maybe
my secondary has admin priv. I'll try from the live cd. Thanks.
